step_data.thought: I've switched back to the 'Car (OSRM)' option, but I need to click the 'Go' button to recalculate the driving route so I can confirm the driving time. From my previous observations, I know that driving takes 4 hours and 39 minutes (4:39) for a distance of 343km, while cycling takes 12 hours and 12 minutes (12:12) for a distance of 455km. After clicking 'Go', I'll be able to confirm the driving time and then provide a final comparison to the user.
